testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository relationship reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: TranslationLink relationship type definition matches known type
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: TranslationLink reference relationship created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: TranslationLink reference relationship can be retrieved as Relationship.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: TranslationLink reference relationship matches the relationship that was saved.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: TranslationLink reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: TranslationLink reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: TranslationLink reference relationship type cannot be changed.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-07: TranslationLink reference relationship identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeRelationshipReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of a relationship of type TranslationLink.  Exception message was : OMRS-METADATA-COLLECTION-501-001 OMRSMetadataInstanceStore method purgeDeleteRelationshipReferenceCopy for OMRS Connector org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.repositoryservices.rest.repositoryconnector.OMRSRESTMetadataCollection to repository type REST-connected Repository https://localhost:9445/servers/SUT_Server is not implemented.  Method was invoked with parameters: relationship : Relationship{headerVersion=1, type=InstanceType{typeDefName='TranslationLink', typeDefCategory=TypeDefCategory{typeCode=8, typeName='RelationshipDef', typeDescription='A link between two entities.'}, typeDefGUID='576228af-33ec-4588-ba4e-6a864a097e10', typeDefVersion=1, typeDefDescription='Links an entity to a collection of translated properties.', typeDefDescriptionGUID='null', typeDefSuperTypes=null, validStatusList=[InstanceStatus{ordinal=15, name='Active', description='The instance is approved and in use.'}, InstanceStatus{ordinal=99, name='Deleted', description='The instance has been deleted and is no longer available.'}], validInstanceProperties=null}, instanceProvenanceType=InstanceProvenanceType{ordinal=1, name='Local to cohort', description='The instance is being maintained within one of the local cohort members.
